ModInfo.Name: Japanese Text Support (PR #737)
ModInfo.Author: CosmosXIII (PR #737) + John Zealand-Doyle
ModInfo.Description: Enables Japanese text rendering in FF7 English executable using FFNx PR #737. Includes all 6 Japanese font texture pages (1,536 glyphs total: Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji) and Japanese dialogue files for field, menu, and battle text. Requires FFNx with PR #737 support and ff7_japanese_edition = true in FFNx.toml.
ModInfo.ReleaseNotes: v1.0: Initial release with complete Japanese text support. Extracted from FF7 International Edition. Fonts by CosmosXIII (PR #737).
